column1: The Purple Pig////Duck neck rillette - Last time we were here we ordered the turkey rillette
column2: which was one of our favorite items. I'd say the duck rillette turned out to be just as good. I still don't know what the hell a rillette is
column3: but picture a meat spread which a texture halfway between pate and shredded meat. It was salty and very dense
column4: just delicious. When you spread it on the toast it cuts some of the saltiness and is just a great appetizer. Throw a little strawberry mostarda on there too to add a little jam-like sweetness. I'm getting whatever neck rillette they have on the menu from now on.
